destinations.name: Cox's Bazar
destinations.description: Cox's Bazar is home to the world's longest natural sea beach, offering stunning sunsets, golden sands, and a relaxing coastal vibe in Bangladesh.

destinations.name: Saint Martin
destinations.description: Saint Martin's Island is Bangladesh's only coral island, famous for its crystal-clear water, coral reefs, and peaceful tropical beauty.

destinations.name: Sreemangal
destinations.description: Discover Bangladesh's incredible natural beauty on this three day Sreemangal tour. Spot native birds at the famous Baikka Beel bird sanctuary.

destinations.name: Sundarbans
destinations.description: The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world and home to the famous Royal Bengal Tiger. Experience unique wildlife and eco-tourism.

destinations.name: Sylhet
destinations.description: Known for its rolling tea gardens, tropical forests, and vibrant Sylheti culture. A perfect blend of natural beauty and cultural heritage.
